text: Nawazish Alam Khan is an Indian politician and member of the Sixteenth Legislative Assembly of Uttar Pradesh. Khan represented the Budhana constituency of Uttar Pradesh and is a member of the Samajwadi Party political party. ==Early life and education== Nawazish Alam Khan was born in Muzaffarnagar, Uttar Pradesh, India in 1979. He holds a Bachelor of Arts degree from Chaudhary Charan Singh University. Prior to joining politics, he was an agriculturist by profession. ==Political career== Nawazish Alam Khan has been a MLA for one term. He represents Budhana (Assembly constituency) and is a member of the Samajwadi Party. ==Posts Held== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! # !! From !! To !! Position !!
